product_name: CamelBak Mini-M.U.L.E. Hydration Pack - 50 fl. oz. - Kids'
long_description: The CamelBak Mini-M.U.L.E. kids' hydration pack lets them carry 50 fl. oz. of water, a snack, sunscreen, house keys and other essentials as they ride. Ventilated mesh back panel and shoulder harness help keep young riders dry and cool. Antidote(TM) wide-mouth 50 fl. oz. reservoir with handle is easy to top off; features filler cap that opens quickly and easily. HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring no leakage during transport. Separate reservoir compartment features a rip-and-stick closure at the top for quick and easy access. Zipper seals off the 153 cu. in. front storage pocket to keep all your rider's goodies in the pack instead of on the ground. Top zip media pocket keeps a music player or cell phone secure. Fits kids ages 5 years and up. CamelBak Mini-M.U.L.E. kids' hydration pack has reflective detailing that increases visibility in low light.
short_description: The CamelBak Mini-M.U.L.E. kids' hydration pack lets them carry 50 fl. oz. of water, a snack, sunscreen, house keys and other essentials as they ride.
